official_title: A bill redesignating the Salisbury-Concord Standard Metropolitan Statistical Area as the "Salisbury-Concord-Kannapolis Standard Metropolitan Statistical Area".

summary.text: Redesignates the Salisbury-Concord Standard Metropolitan Statistical Area in North Carolina as the Salisbury-Concord-Kannapolis Standard Metropolitan Statistical Area.
